Uses of Class
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.request.Request

Packages that use Request
Package
Description
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.admin
Provides the models on which the various classes are based to communicate with the database and to provide the answers by formatting them, regarding the admins
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.manager
Provides the models on which the various classes are based to communicate with the database and to provide the answers by formatting them, regarding the managers
com.scarcolo.eventour.repository.manager
provides "unconventional" requests and responses for managers regarding the repository
com.scarcolo.eventour.service.admin
Provides the services of the application, that is, the links and the logic that processes the requests and returns the responses by formatting them, regarding the admins.
com.scarcolo.eventour.service.manager
Provides the services of the application, that is, the links and the logic that processes the requests and returns the responses by formatting them, regarding the managers and their request.
